name: dynamodb-ui
description: 100% client side HTML gui for AWS DynamoDB.

scripts.libs: mkdir -p dist/js && concat -o dist/js/libs.js src/libs/async-2.6.0.js src/libs/promise-6.1.0.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-1.0.0-build-107.min.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-window.min.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-scrollarea.js src/libs/ace/ace-1.2.9.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-ace.js src/libs/ace/mode_sql.js  src/libs/ace/custom.js
scripts.dynamodb-ui: concat -o dist/js/dynamodb-ui.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/session.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/gui.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-minitablelist.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablelistfull.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablecreate.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tabletab.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tableinfo.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablemetrics.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablealarms.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablecapacity.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tableindexes.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tableglobal.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tablebackup.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tabletriggers.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tableitems.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tabledata.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-tabs.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-login.js src/libs/dynamodb-ui/c-dynamodb-ui.js
